mapper.sql: SELECT notice_id, writer, notice_title, notice_context, notice_regdate, notice_category, notice_private FROM tb_notice
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_notice (writer, notice_title, notice_context, notice_category, notice_private) VALUES(#{writer}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_context}, #{notice_category}, #{notice_private});
mapper.select: order by notice_regdate desc , notice_id desc limit #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_notice set VIEW_CNT = VIEW_CNT + 1 where notice_id = #{notice_id}
